statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-2 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 3 , 4 \, x^{3} - 8 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 15 , -3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 6 , 3 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 6 , 14 \, x^{3} - 26 \, x^{2} + 16 \, x + 42\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
